parameters.name: awsGlacierPrice
parameters.description: Cost of one GiB storage from AWS glacier for one month. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: annualIncome
parameters.description: Annual income from selling storage on the storage market. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: monthlyIncome
parameters.description: Monthly income from selling storage on the storage market. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: comparableMonthlyCost
parameters.description: Expected cost of purchasing monthly storage from commodity provider. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: sealCost
parameters.description: Cost of investment required to seal one GiB in one hour at scale. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: commodityStorageDiscount
parameters.description: Fraction of commodity storage pricing expected as income from storage market. Unit: decimal fraction

parameters.name: minerMonthsToCapacity
parameters.description: Months it should take a miner to reach full storage capacity. Unit: months

parameters.name: gibCapacity
parameters.description: GiB of storage at full capacity. Unit: GiB

parameters.name: tibCapacity
parameters.description: TiB of storage at full capacity. Unit: TiB

parameters.name: annualTib
parameters.description: TiB of storage which must be brought online per year. Unit: TiB

parameters.name: monthlyTib
parameters.description: TiB of storage which must be brought online per month. Unit: TiB

parameters.name: dailyTib
parameters.description: TiB of storage which must be brought online per day. Unit: TiB

parameters.name: hourlyTib
parameters.description: TiB of storage which must be brought online per hour. Unit: TiB

parameters.name: hourlyGib
parameters.description: GiB of storage which must be brought online per hour. Unit: GiB

parameters.name: sealCyclesPerHour
parameters.description: CPU required to seal at required rate for one hour. Unit: cycles

parameters.name: sealCyclesPerMinute
parameters.description: CPU required to seal at required rate for one minute. Unit: cycles

parameters.name: sealCyclesPerSecond
parameters.description: CPU required to seal at required rate for one second. Unit: cycles

parameters.name: gibSealCycles
parameters.description: Total CPU cycles required to seal 1 GiB. Unit: Giga-cycles

parameters.name: neededGhz
parameters.description: Total GhZ capacity needed to seal at the required rate.

parameters.name: upFrontDriveCost
parameters.description: Up-front investment in hard drives required to store sufficient sealed data. Unit: dollars.

parameters.name: upFrontMemoryCost
parameters.description: Up-front investment in memory (RAM) required to seal at necessary rate. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: upFrontComputeCost
parameters.description: Up-front investement in compute hardware required to seal at necessary rate. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: upFrontSealingCost
parameters.description: Up-front investment in total hardware require to seal at necessary rate. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: totalUpFrontCost
parameters.description: Total up-front investment required to generate MONTHLY-INCOME. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: averageMonthlyIncomeDuringRampUp
parameters.description: Average monthly income before miner reaches capacity (assuming linear growth). Unit: dollars

parameters.name: incomeDuringRampUp
parameters.description: Total income during ramp-up period (before reaching capacity). Unit: dollars

parameters.name: incomeToRoiAtCapacity
parameters.description: Income still required to reach return on investment after reaching capacity. Unit: dollars

parameters.name: roiMonthsAtCapacity
parameters.description: Months needed after reaching capacity before return on investment.

parameters.name: roiMonths
parameters.description: Months over which a miner should see return on investment.

parameters.name: oneYearProfitMonths
parameters.description: Months from ROI to one year of profit. Unit: months

parameters.name: oneYearProfit
parameters.description: Profit after one year of operation: Unit: dollars

parameters.name: oneYearRoi
parameters.description: ROI after one year of operation: Unit: fraction

parameters.name: twoYearProfitMonths
parameters.description: Months from ROI to two years of profit. Unit: months

parameters.name: twoYearProfit
parameters.description: Profit after two years of operation: Unit: dollars

parameters.name: twoYearRoi
parameters.description: ROI after two years of operation: Unit: fraction

parameters.name: threeYearProfitMonths
parameters.description: Months from ROI to three years of profit. Unit: months

parameters.name: threeYearProfit
parameters.description: Profit after three years of operation: Unit: dollars

parameters.name: threeYearRoi
parameters.description: ROI after three years of operation: Unit: fraction

parameters.name: sealHz
parameters.description: Cycles per second at which the sealing machine operates. Unit: Hz

parameters.name: sealghz
parameters.description: Cycles per second at which the sealing machine operates. Unit: GHz

parameters.name: sectorGib
parameters.description: Size of one sector. Unit: GiB

parameters.name: sectorSize
parameters.description: Size of one sector. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: commDSize
parameters.description: Size of the data commitment (CommD). Unit: bytes

parameters.name: commRSize
parameters.description: Size of the replica commitment (CommR). Unit: bytes

parameters.name: commRStarSize
parameters.description: Size of the aggregated commitment to each layer's replica (CommR*). Unit: bytes

parameters.name: commRsSize
parameters.description: Size of all replica commitments. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: commitmentsSize
parameters.description: Size of all commitments returned by Seal. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: onChainPorepSize
parameters.description: On-chain size of one Seal proof plus commitments. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: degree
parameters.description: Total in-degree of the ZigZag graph.

parameters.name: baseDegree
parameters.description: In-degree of the base depth-robust graph (DRG).

parameters.name: expansionDegree
parameters.description: Maximum in-degree of the bipartite expander graph component of a ZigZag graph.

parameters.name: slothIter
parameters.description: Number of iterations of sloth verifiable delay encoding (VDE) to perform.

parameters.name: partitions
parameters.description: Number of circuit partitions into which a proof is divided.

parameters.name: replicationTime
parameters.description: Time to replicate one sector. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: replicationTimePerByte
parameters.description: Time to replicate one byte. Unit: seconds / byte

parameters.name: replicationTimePerGib
parameters.description: Time to replicate one GiB. Unit: seconds / GiB

parameters.name: sealingTime
parameters.description: Total CPU time to seal (replicate + generate proof of replication) one sector. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: nonCircuitProvingTime
parameters.description: Time to generate a non-circuit proof of replication. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: vectorCommitmentTime
parameters.description: Time to generate the vector commitments used in a non-circuit proof of replication. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: circuitProvingTimePerConstraint
parameters.description: Groth16 circuit proving time (from benchmarks) per constraint. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: circuitProvingTime
parameters.description: Time to generate a circuit proof of replication using Groth16. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: zigzagTotalProvingTime
parameters.description: Total time to generate a proof of replication (circuit and non-circuit). Unit: seconds

parameters.name: sealTime
parameters.description: Total time to seal (replication + proving) one sector. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: sectorGib
parameters.description: Number of GiB in one sector. Unit: GiB

parameters.name: gibSealTime
parameters.description: Total time to seal (replication + proving) one GiB. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: totalParents
parameters.description: Number of parents (or padding) each node uses when performing key derivation.

parameters.name: singleKdfHashes
parameters.description: Number of hashes performed as part of a single application of the key-derivation function (KDF).

parameters.name: kdfHashes
parameters.description: Number of hashes performed as part of the key-derivation function (KDF).

parameters.name: singleKdfTime
parameters.description: Hashing time to perform a single KDF. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: singleLayerMerkleHashingTime
parameters.description: Merkle hashing time for a single layer. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: totalMerkleTrees
parameters.description: Total merkle trees which must be generated.

parameters.name: totalMerkleHashingTime
parameters.description: Total time to generate all merkle trees. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: totalNodesToEncode
parameters.description: Total nodes to encode across all layers.

parameters.name: singleNodeSlothTime
parameters.description: Time to perform sloth (VDE) for a single node. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: singleNodeEncodingTime
parameters.description: Time to encode a single node. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: singleChallengeInclusionProofs
parameters.description: Number of inclusion proofs which must be verified for a single challenge.

parameters.name: singleChallengeMerkleHases
parameters.description: Number of merkle hashes which must be verified for a single challenge.

parameters.name: singleChallengeKdfHashes
parameters.description: Number of KDF hashes which must be verified for a single challenge.

parameters.name: singleChallengeSlothVerifications
parameters.description: Number of sloth iterations which must be verified for a single challenge.

parameters.name: totalKdfHashes
parameters.description: Total number of KDF (key-derivation function) required during replication.

parameters.name: totalZigzagMerkleHashingConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of merkle hashing constraints in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagKdfHashingConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of kdf hashing constraints in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagHashingConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of hashing constraints in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagNonHashingConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of hashes which must be verified in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagCircuitMerkleHashes
parameters.description: Total number of merkle hashes which must be verified in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagCircuitKdfHashes
parameters.description: Total number of KDF hashes which must be verified in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: totalZigzagSlothConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of constraints due to sloth verification.

parameters.name: totalZigzagConstraints
parameters.description: Total number of constraints which must be verified in a ZigZag circuit.

parameters.name: layerReplicationTime
parameters.description: Time to replicate one layer. Unit: seconds

parameters.name: storageToProofSizeRatio
parameters.description: Ratio of sealed sector size to on-chain PoRep size.

parameters.name: storageToProofSizeFloat
parameters.description: Ratio of sealed sector size to on-chain PoRep size -- expressed as a float.

parameters.name: singleCircuitProofSize
parameters.description: Size of a single Groth16 Proof. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: totalCircuitProofSize
parameters.description: Total size of a single circuit proof. Unit: bytes

parameters.name: nodeBytes
parameters.description: The number of bytes in a node -- must also be the hash digest size.

parameters.name: merkleTreeLeaves
parameters.description: Number of leaves in the merkle tree.

parameters.name: merkleTreeHeightRaw
parameters.description: Height of the merkle tree. Unit: float which MUST be integer-valued

parameters.name: merkleTreeHeight
parameters.description: Height of the merkle tree, including leaves and root.

parameters.name: merkleTreeHashCount
parameters.description: Total number of hashes required to construct the merkle tree (leaves are not hashed).

parameters.name: merkleInclusionProofHashLength
parameters.description: Number of hashes required for a merkle inclusion proof.

parameters.name: merkleInclusionProofHashLengthRaw
parameters.description: Number of hashes required for a merkle inclusion proof. Unit: float which MUST be integer-valued.

parameters.name: zigzagSoundness
parameters.description: ZigZag soundness: Unit fraction

parameters.name: zigzagLambda
parameters.description: ZigZag soundness: Unit bits

parameters.name: zigzagEpsilon
parameters.description: Maximum allowable deletion (space tightness): Unit: fraction

parameters.name: zigzagDelta
parameters.description: Maximum allowable cheating on labels (block corruption)

parameters.name: zigzagBasicLayerChallenges
parameters.description: Multiple of lambda challenges per layer, without tapering optimization.

parameters.name: zigzagSpaceGap
parameters.description: Maximum allowable gap between actual and claimed storage. Unit: fraction

schema.description: Filecoin Requirements -- sine qua non (without which not)

parameters.name: mustHaveFilecoin
parameters.description: WE MUST HAVE FILECOIN -- SWEET, SWEET FILECOIN.

parameters.name: spaceGapSatisfied
parameters.description: Is the actual space gap less than or equal to the maximum allowable space gap?

parameters.name: filecoinRequirementsSatisfied
parameters.description: Are the Filecoin requirements all satisfied?

parameters.name: minimumOneYearRoi
parameters.description: Minimum allowable ROI after one year.

parameters.name: minimumTwoYearRoi
parameters.description: Minimum allowable ROI after two years.

parameters.name: minimumThreeYearRoi
parameters.description: Minimum allowable ROI after three years.

parameters.name: minimumStorageToProofSizeRatio
parameters.description: Minimum necessary storage to on-chain proof ratio.

parameters.name: profit
parameters.description: Profit.
